name: Pag-Bug
description:
Pac-Bug

An infection has been detected!!

Defend the body against diseases by ingesting all viruses before they reach the lungs!

Move the blue leukocyte using arrow keys.

Press 'Enter' to start.

Press 'P' to pause the game.

Press 'R' to restart the game.

This is my entry for the Game Off 2021

Credits

Game coded with Phaser 3 JavaScript Game engine.

Assets

Virus and Lung sprites by Mathijs: https://opengameart.org/content/organs-and-virus

Player sprite by drakzlin: https://opengameart.org/content/20x20-tileset 

Breathing sound effect from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com

Other sounds made with Jsfxr from https://sfxr.me/
